entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
